game.name: Train Simulator: Southern Pacific SD70M Loco Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The vast number of SD70 diesel locomotives produced since the early 1990s has seen the Class become one of the most popular diesel models seen on the US rail network, and the SD70M is now available for Train Simulator in Southern Pacific livery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The vast number of SD70 diesel locomotives produced since the early 1990s has seen the Class become one of the most popular diesel models seen on the US rail network, and the SD70M is now available for Train Simulator in Southern Pacific livery.
